data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mao, Ben-Yong, Niu, Yao, Zheng, Zhe-Min, Scott, Matthew B. (2015): Review of the genus Qinshuiacris (Orthoptera: Acrididae) from China with proposal of Caryanda viridis - species group and description of a new species. Zootaxa 3981 (4): 565-576, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3981.4.7
